## PromoteOptions interface

Auth UI anonymous user promotion options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare interface PromoteOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [redirectURI](./react-native.promoteoptions.redirecturi.md) | <code>string</code> | Redirect uri. Redirection URI to which the response will be sent after authorization. |
|  [state](./react-native.promoteoptions.state.md) | <code>string</code> | OAuth 2.0 state value. |
|  [uiLocales](./react-native.promoteoptions.uilocales.md) | <code>string[]</code> | UI locale tags |
